channel.title: Luke on Byzantique
channel.description: Recent content in Luke on Byzantique

item.title: Luke 8:22–56
item.description: Master over storms (8:22–25) Translation Notes Encounter with the Gadarenes demoniac (8:26–39) Translation Notes Jairus’ daughter raised from the dead and woman with bleeding issue healed (8:40–56) Translation Notes This pericope begins a section of multiple accounts demonstrating Jesus’ power over nature / primordial chaos (wind and waves; vv. 22–25), unclean spirits (vv. 26–39), disease, and death (vv. 40–56). Master over storms (8:22–25) Lectionary 21st Wednesday after Pentecost Translation Luke 8:22–25 (TCENT) 22 One day Jesus got into a boat with his disciples and said to them, “Let us cross over to the other side of the lake.
